channel.title: Saas UI
channel.description: Advanced UI components for SaaS products.

item.title: Introducing the new Glass theme for Chakra UI
item.description: Today I'm happy to announce that the new Glass theme for Chakra UI I've been working on is now available for download.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)

item.title: Say hello to Saas UI
item.description: I'm proud to introduce you to Saas UI, an advanced component library built on top of Chakra UI.
item.author: hello@saas-ui.dev (Eelco Wiersma)
